The endoscope system (10) according to claim 1, wherein said imaging control means (70) chooses which one of said normal and high-sensitivity image sensors (53, 60) to use for imaging said body portion irradiated with said special illumination light in accordance with said reflected light amount of said special illumination light; and
said special image processing means (80) produces said special image (91) based on a signal obtained by selected one of said normal and high-sensitivity image sensors (53, 60).

The endoscope system (10) according to claim 2, wherein
said light amount measurement means (78) measures said reflected light amount of said special illumination light repeatedly in certain cycles, and said imaging control means (70) chooses which one of said normal and high-sensitivity image sensors (53, 60) to use based on said reflected light amount;
when said normal image sensor (53) is used, said imaging control means (70) stops using said normal image sensor (53) and starts using said high-sensitivity image sensor (60), if said reflected light amount is less than a first sensor selection threshold value; and
when said high-sensitivity image sensor (60) is used, said imaging control means (70) stops using said high-sensitivity image sensor (60) and starts using said normal image sensor (53), if said reflected light amount is more than a second sensor selection threshold value, wherein
said second sensor selection threshold value is larger than said first sensor selection threshold value.

The endoscope system (10) according to claim 2 or 3,
wherein
said lighting means (13, 43, 48, 22) sequentially applies to said body portion said special illumination light and normal illumination light having a broad wavelength band, said normal illumination light being used for producing a normal image (90);
when said reflected light amount of said special illumination light is low, said imaging control means (70) controls said normal and high-sensitivity image sensors (53, 60) such that said normal image sensor (53) captures said image under irradiation with said normal illumination light and said high-sensitivity image sensor (60) captures said image under irradiation with said special illumination light; and
when said reflected light amount of said special illumination light is not low, said imaging control means (70) controls said normal and high-sensitivity image sensors (53, 60) such that said normal image sensor (53) captures said image under irradiation with said normal illumination light and said special illumination light.

The endoscope system (10) according to one of claims 2 to 4, wherein
said normal illumination light includes red light, green light, and blue light;
said special illumination light includes at least blue narrow band light having a wavelength at which oxyhemoglobin and deoxyhemoglobin have different absorption coefficients; and
said lighting means (13, 43, 48, 22) selectively emits said red light, said green light, said blue light, and said blue narrow band light.

The endoscope system according to one of claims 2 to 4,
wherein
said normal illumination light is first emission light including first blue narrow band light and fluorescence obtained by wavelength conversion of said first blue narrow band light by a wavelength conversion element (98);
said special illumination light is second emission light including second blue narrow band light and fluorescence obtained by wavelength conversion of said second blue narrow band light by said wavelength conversion element (98); and
said lighting means (100, 43, 48, 22) selectively emits said first and second emission light.
The endoscope system (10) according to one of claims 1 to 6, wherein sensitivity of said high-sensitivity image sensor (60) is 2 to 200 times that of said normal image sensor (53).

The endoscope system (10) according to claim 4, wherein
when said reflected light amount of said special illumination light is low, said normal image sensor (53) captures said image under irradiation with said normal illumination light and outputs a color normal signal, and said high-sensitivity image sensor (60) captures said image under irradiation with said special illumination light and outputs a special signal; and

The endoscope system (10) according to claim 8, wherein when said reflected light amount of said special illumination light is not low, said normal image sensor (53) captures said image under irradiation with said normal illumination light and outputs said color normal signal, and captures said image under irradiation with said special illumination light and outputs said special signal; and
